description:
Are you fascinated by the idea of making lots of money picking stocks? Do you feel overwhelmed getting started in stocks?

This simple course is designed to help you get started.

I felt those same concerns when I started learning about the stock market. Through my career on Wall Street I have learned the rights and wrongs of stock investing.

In this course you will learn the fundamentals of the stock market.

Included:

·How to start investing right now

·How the stock market works

·Why stock prices go up and down

·Explanations of stock market terms

This Course Includes:

·An easy to follow guide on how the stock market works.

·Examples to help form a complete understanding of concepts.

·Free resources and tools you can use to right away.
title: How to Understand Stocks
